00012 void CommandPerformSearch::Execute()
00013 {
00014     parse_search_string();
00015 
00016     for (std::map<std::string, boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> >::const_iterator it = m_translation_manager->begin(); it != m_translation_manager->end(); ++it)
00017     {
00018         (*it->second).search(m_search_queries);
00019     }
00020 
00021     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> >::const_iterator end = m_search_queries.end();
00022     if (m_search_queries.begin() != end)
00023         m_search_results = *(--end);
00024 }
00025 
00026 boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> CommandPerformSearch::get_results()
00027 {
00028     return m_search_results;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void CommandPerformSearch::parse_search_string()
00032 {
00033     boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> query(new SearchResultsSerial(m_search_string));
00034     m_search_queries.push_back(query);
00035 }
